strIntroduction: Never say you've been to Korea, if you didn't visited Seoul tower! Namsan Seoul Tower is one of the famous landmarks in Korea, where you can enjoy different views of Seoul. Here is also famous for using love-locker with your lover and friends to keep memory of this trip forever!

strTitle: 30% Off! Everland Theme Park QR Code Ticket (Express tickets "Q Pass" available)

strIntroduction: Being one of the shooting scenes in Korean drama, "My Love from the Star" and a well-known spot in Seoul, Hangang River is absolutely a place you can never say you've been to Seoul without visiting it! Not only can you soak in the romantic drama mood, but fall for the gorgeous scenery of Seoul here. Don't forget to schedule this spot into your next trip in Korea!

What are you going to do this summer? Known as a place which all ages will have a great time in, Caribbean Park not only has the 500 meter long waterslide and kid's pools, but offers indoor SPA facilities!

Being one of the famous theme park in Korea, Lotte World provides not only indoor and outdoor facilities but shopping mall! No matter how old you are, you'll definitely fall in love with this place. What's more, one of the Korea dramas- Stairway to Heaven and Full House were both filmed here!

Can't stand complicated metro transportations and language barrier anymore? Here's some packages just suit your demands. With private charter bus and driver, you can go wherever you want without worrying traffic problems.(Ordering a tour guide is available also!)
strLocation: Korea, Jeju, Gyeongju, Jeonju, Gangwon, Gyeonggi, Seoul

strIntroduction: When people talk about Korea, they'll never forget about Kimchi! Seoul Kimchi Academy House not only provide you a special occasion to make your own Kimchi and topokki with experts but also make me more familiar with Korean culture!
strTitle: Kimchi and Topokki making and Hanbok fitting in Seoul.

strIntroduction: Would you like to explore the mysterious relationship between South and North Korea? What does the real North Korea look like? Let's discover the reality of the 38 Degree North and visit the invisible line personally to feel the excitement of silence!
strTitle: Korean Demilitarized zone (DMZ) and Joint Security Area (JSA) Panmunjom Tour

strIntroduction: Finally!!!! We can get rid of annoying traffics! In stead of saving your time, the Incheon-Seoul Express Train is way too convenient that you just need to transfer inside the airport! (Secret time: Seoul station is the only place where you can check-in previously!)
strTitle: AREX Express Train ticket (to or from Incheon Airport)

strIntroduction: Crossover with the top wedding company, S.A. Wedding, we offer you the shooting experience with skillful photographers, hairdressers, and the most important, affordable price! Wanna create priceless memory with your beloved? Remember to schedule this wedding experience into your trip!
strTitle: Wedding shooting experince at Korea top wedding company, S.A. Wedding

strIntroduction: Your trip best helper, KR Pass, not only saves your time and money, but provides a more convenient way to travel ariund in Korea!
strLocation: Korea, Gyeongnam, Chungnam, Daegu, Seoul, Busan

strIntroduction: Are you a super fan of Korean drama? If the answer is yes, you must not miss the tour going to the movie Gangnam 1970 and A Werewolf Boy filming spot. Besides, we'll also pay a visit to one of the five coastal wetlands on earth!
strTitle: From Busan: Boseong Green Tea Field, Suncheon Bay Garden, and Suncheon Open Film Location one-day Tour

strIntroduction: The most popular Korean Hiphop TV show, SMTM 5 will hold a live concert in Seoul this August. Wanna See rappers battle? Just come and join!
strTitle: Show Me The Money 5 Live Concert in Seoul

strIntroduction: Have you imagined yourself with a kpop-star makeup? We'll send professional Korean stylists to your place to put on makeup for you! It'll definitely be a marvelous experience!
strTitle: Korean style hair and makeup service

strIntroduction: Even though you seldom hear of Gyeonggi do, you must have seen it appearing in Korean drama and variety show! Famous sightseeing spots like Petite France, Nami Island and Gangchon Rail Bike are waiting for you to explore!
strTitle: Petite France, Namiseom Island, Raibike One-Day Tour

strIntroduction: Adorable hop-on hop-off bus is the most popular transportation to travel with in Busan recently! Among this loop tour, we'll pass through many popular scenic spots. If you wanna leave your footsteps at Haeundae Beach, don't hesitate just click this and get ready for your trip!
strTitle: Busan City Tour Bus - Red Line(Haeundae)

strIntroduction: Have you ever wondered the same question like me, "Is there any special sight in Korea?" From the gorgeous scenery of Yangpyeong Dumulmeori Lake to Light Bulb Festival in Herb Island, just follow our footsteps and explore the different Korea with us!
strTitle: 1-day tour to Yangpyeong Dumulmeori Lake, Edelweiss Swiss Theme Park and Pocheon Herb Island

strIntroduction: The royal cuisine has the highest quality when referring to Korean food. Come to Korean House, and be an emperorï¼
strTitle: Enjoy a royal cuisine and performances in the Korean House

strIntroduction: VVIP exclusive! The specialized spa programs at Cheongkwanjang Spa G using six-year-old ginseng roots that will not only turn you more charming but ease your pressure!
Do you want to dance like a k-pop star? Do you feel that k-pop dance is sooo cool? Let's Join K-pop dancing camp immediately. To dance like a super artist, you cannot miss the chance this time.
strTitle: ã€Learn Dancing with the teacher of Bigbang ã€‘KPOP Dance Training Camp

strIntroduction: Are you up for a challenge? There's no need to travel all the way to the opposite side of earth to take risks! The Dynamic Maze in Seoul is an action-packed obstacle course composed of 15 stages designed to be surpassed with strategy and teamwork. Just come and figure the clues out with your besties!
Jeju Island has been well known for wedding photo due to its great natural sceneries. Snap photo in Jeju will give you unforgettable memory

The never seen kungfu show, performing with exaggerating body expression not only breaks the language barriers but promotes eastern martial art! If you have big interest in eastern martial art, taekwondo, or you just enjoy special things, remember to book the tickets and spend an unforgettable night here!
strTitle: JUMP SHOW - Comic Martial Arts Performance

strIntroduction: Tour bus is the most popular transportation to travel with in Busan recently! As a harbor city, night views of Busan will definitely surprise you! Not only the stunning Gwangan Bridge, but the most popular spots, Haeundae Beach is all included in this route. Wanna create an irreplaceable city tour? Just a click and we can have fun in Busan together!
If you want to experience the romantic sight of Busan, you can never miss Gadeok Island. Following the steps of locals, you can realize the secret of Busan. Each corner is really worth photographing!
strTitle: Dynamic Busan Tour in Gadeok Island

strIntroduction: Come and enjoy the localest tour with KKday! Besides showing you Mysterious Road, Jeonbang Waterfall, and Jusangjeolli, this full-day bus tour will also bring you to a cafÃ© beside the cost road to enjoy your time with a cup of coffee and amazing scenery around you!
strTitle: Full-Day Guided Bus Tour to Southern Jeju

strIntroduction: As its name 'Naejang' meaning many secrets in the mountain, Naejangsan Mt. not only has abundant species, but breath-taking scenery. If you're now scheduling your Autumn trip, the must-go maple-seeing spot, Naejangsan Mt. will surely satisfied you!
strTitle: Korea Autumn Maple Tour, Naejangsan Mountain (Cable car included.)

strIntroduction: Do you still remember the romantic proposal in 'Oh! My Venus' which is shot in Herb Island? Besides taking you to this gorgeous place, we'll also bring you to Edelweiss Swiss Theme Park to enjoy the exotic atmosphere over there and have some Korean snacks later!
strTitle: Day trip to Korea Tea room in Edelweiss and Lantern Festival in Herb Island

strIntroduction: The shooting spot of "Running Man" and "We Got Married", you can not only soak in the beautiful scenery, but enjoy various kinds of facilities for all ages! As a collector of amusement parks, you must pay a visit to the very first one theme park in Korea!

Wanna be as gorgeous and breath-taking as K-pop stars on TV? KKday now offers you a special opportunity to experience a K-star's life. Not only will the professional stylists style you up from makeup to hair dressing, but the photographer will seize every single moment of you with his/ her camera!
strTitle: Personal Korean style up for personal photo album

strIntroduction: Itaewon Land is a jjimjilbang opened in 2003 in Itaewon, which is a popular attraction place for foreigners in Seoul.

To enjoy the color of autumn foliage, you can never miss Naejangsan! With 760 kinds of local plants, designated natural monuments, and various wild animals living inside, Naejangsan attracts people from all over the world to appreciate its wonders of scenes!
Enjoy unlimited ultra high-speed date connection at so cheap price!you don't need to carry on the wifi egg,the easiest way to share your amazing travel with friends!
strTitle: KT Sim card with unlimited data

strIntroduction: Do you wanna sharpen your dancing skill or say the first hello to dancing? Here's a place that will just satisfy your appetite; K-pop Dance Studio where you can learn the hottest K-pop dance taught by professinal K-pop backup dancers.

Known as one of the summertime must-go places, Jeju Island not only has significant scenery on land but breeds abundance of living creatures under the sea. Wanna spend time with those adorable creatures and enjoy the view below sea level? Having a snorkeling experience with a professional instructor will surely satisfied you!

There are various exotic attractions here in Paju, one of classic filming locations of Korean dramas. Well-known dramas like City Hunter, You're Beautiful and The Heirs all have filmed here. Besides, there is no way to miss couple's favorite three attractions, Provence Village, The Botanical Garden BCJ and Heyri Art Village, when you visit Paju!

Besides NANTA, BIBAP, and the painters: HERO, here's a new show for you to enjoy in Seoul. Narrating the inspiring story of a crowd who determine to become firemen, FIREMAN offers us a 75-minute nonstop tense and impressive performance!

Repair the exhausted body right here! You must not miss the spa experience when you're in Korea! With six-year-old red ginseng using massage, it'll realize your stress, refresh your soul and make you prettier from the inside of your body simultaneously!
Do you want to enjoy amazing blossom scenes? Then, you can never miss fairytale Edelweiss Swiss theme park and the Garden of Morning Calm!
strTitle: 1-day tour to Edelweiss Swiss, Garden of Morning Calm and Gangchon Rail Park

strIntroduction: South Korean girl group, MAMAMOO, will hold their first concert in Seoul this August. As a fan of them, you mustn't miss this live concert.
Jeju Golden Bus City Tourprovides an opportunity to take a one-stop tour of the beautiful Jejudo.Unlimited transfers with Day Passï¼ï¼

Are you the man who love exciting activities? If the answer is "yes", make sure that you don't miss the water coaster "JET-BOAT KK7800 boats"! Remember to have your first jet ride at The Bay 101 when you visit Busan next time!
strTitle: [Enjoy the speed!] Busan The Bay101 jet boat ticket

strIntroduction: Do you remember the squirrel Sandy in sponge Bob who wears an oxygen mask and walks in the sea? You can also become a seawalker now in Jeju island!

There's no need for understanding Korean to enjoy in this show! The Look offers not only a nonverbal performance, but a show with interaction between performers and audience. Wanna enjoy some new things in Seoul? The Look will surely satisfy you!
strTitle: Seoul Original Drawing Show "The Look" tickets

strIntroduction: Summertime only! Besides following us to have an adventure in the Pig Museum and enjoy cuisines at the top ten restaurants in Gyeonggi do, you'll also pay a visit to the first premium designer outlet in Korea. What's more, you can have a glass of fresh grape juice and a box of grapes after the tour!
strTitle: Experience in Grapes Farm+Little Piggy Museum+Yeoju Premium Outlets one-day tour

strIntroduction: Do you wanna try something cool and fun in this busy city, Seoul? Viewed as the latest outdoor activity among the world, standup paddleboarding not only provides you an exciting experience, but let you enjoy the scenery on Han River simultaneously!

Looking for a Hanbok experience at various landmarks in Seoul? Here we offer an outdoor hanbok experience which is more special than any other! Come and put this gorgeous clothes on to create a wonderful memory in Seoul!

Adorable hop-on hop-off bus is the most popular transportation to travel with in Busan recently! Among this loop tour, we'll pass through many popular scenic spots. Let's leave our footprints from Oryukdo to the top of Hwangryeongsan Mt.!
strTitle: Busan City Tour Bus - Green Line(Igidae Direction)

strIntroduction: Besides visiting one of the must go sightseeing spots in Korea, The Garden of Morning Calm, you'll enjoy a cup of coffee at Santorini CafÃ© with amazing scene surrounded. Last but not least, an exciting ATV experience is also contained in this one-day tour!
strTitle: Experience your Korea: A day-trip to Santorini Cafe+The Garden of MorningCalm+ATV rides

strIntroduction: Come and enjoy the localest tour with KKday! Besides showing you the world hertiage, Seongsan Ilchulbong Peak, this full-day bus tour will also bring you to Sangumburi Crater and Woman Diver Show.
strTitle: Full-Day Guided Bus Tour to Eastern Jeju

strIntroduction: Both voice and data with your own phone at affordable prices.Access to internet anywhere in Korea using Koreaâ€™s best quality mobile network.

Come and enjoy the localest tour with KKday! Besides showing you Hallim Park, Suweolbong, and Spirited Garden, this full-day bus tour will also bring you to Teddy Bear Museum and take you to the traditional Korean-style Buffet!
strTitle: Full-Day Guided Bus Tour to Western Jeju

strIntroduction: Although you may not heard of Danyang, it's a maple-seeing site Korean highly recommend. As one of the popular historical dramas filming spots, Danyang has a absolutely different charm from big city. Next time, when you're scheduling your trip, don't forget to visit this place and soak in the amazing scene!
strTitle: Korea Autumn Maple Tour, Danyang, North Chungcheong Province One-Day Tour

strIntroduction: A day trip visiting cultures of Korea, Jeonju Hanok Village and relaxing yourself at Jinan Red Ginseng Spa. Besides soaking in the spa with red ginseng and oriental medicinal herbs to release pressure, you are also able to embrace the scene of Maisan Mt. during your spa time.
Take yourself on a higher and more exciting adventure with Gyeonggi paragliding experience. Soar above 520 meters in the sky and be amazed by the beautiful senery of the Yongjin city.

Wanna be a time traveler going back to the old times of Korea? Although time travel may sounds ridiculous, GoGuan can to some extent meet your requirements! With various kinds of figure clothing, GoGuan offers you an opportunity to act as if you were a well-known noble then!

Wanna have some special in Jeju Island? That KKday recommend you HERO! HERO is an innovative art performance that stages the mind-blowing skills of drawing with incredible visual effects filled with a witty mime and dance right before your eyes during this 80 mins show.
strTitle: Arts Avenue - The Painters: HERO in Jeju Island

strIntroduction: INFINITE is going to hold their " That Summer 3 " concert in August this summer, Let's go join them in Seoul through some clicks!
strTitle: INFINITE - That Summer 3 concert in Seoul
